name: Muhammad Faiq
description: Passionate Full Stack & Mobile App Developer specializing in MERN stack, React Native, and Flutter. Expert in building cross-platform mobile applications and scalable web solutions with React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Delivers high-performance, responsive applications for web and mobile platforms.
aboutSummary: As a results-driven Full Stack & Cross-Platform Mobile Developer, I build performant, scalable products using MERN stack, React Native, and Flutter. Specializing in cross-platform mobile app development and full-stack web solutions, I create seamless experiences across iOS, Android, and web platforms with modern technologies and best practices.

services.name: MERN Stack Development
services.description: Full-stack web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js

services.name: Frontend Development
services.description: Modern, responsive user interfaces with React.js, Next.js, and modern CSS frameworks

services.name: Backend Development
services.description: Robust server-side applications with Node.js, Express.js, and various databases

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter and React Native

services.name: API Development
services.description: RESTful APIs and microservices with authentication and payment integration

services.name: Database Design
services.description: Database architecture and optimization for SQL and NoSQL databases

projects.title: NY212 (clone)
projects.shortDescription: High-performance, fully responsive e-commerce site inspired by NY212. Built with Next.js, Strapi, and Vercel.
projects.description: Developed a high-performance, fully responsive e-commerce site inspired by NY212 using Next.js (App Router) and Strapi as the headless CMS. Focused on performance and SEO by pre-rendering dynamic content at build time using generateStaticParams and generateMetadata, achieving 100/100 Lighthouse scores. Deployed on Vercel for global scalability and edge-speed delivery. This project showcases my skills in full-stack development, API integration, and performance-first architecture. Associated with COMSATS University Islamabad, Lahore Campus.

projects.title: EmployEase (HRMS System)
projects.shortDescription: Centralized HRMS system for employee outsourcing, recruitment, payroll, and performance tracking.
projects.description: EmployEase is a centralized HRMS web application that connects companies with skilled outsourced employees. The platform includes a resume parsing system powered by AI, a ranking algorithm for job matching, attendance and payroll management, and performance tracking. Companies can register, post jobs, manage interviews, and track hired employee progress. Employees only need to upload their CVs, and the system automatically extracts their experience and ranks them accordingly. Developed as a Final Year Project at COMSATS University Islamabad, Lahore Campus.

projects.title: Smart City AI-Powered Environmental Monitoring Platform
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered full-stack platform for real-time weather analytics, AQI tracking, and predictive modeling.
projects.description: An enterprise-grade full-stack platform delivering real-time weather analytics, AQI tracking, predictive modeling, and intelligent alerts. Built with React.js, Node.js, Python (Flask), and MongoDB, it integrates advanced machine learning models for 24-hour forecasting, ApexCharts for dynamic visualizations, and JWT-secured authentication. Features live dashboards, heatmaps, automated email alerts, offline-ready data handling, and scalable microservices for smart cities, agriculture, and compliance systems. Designed for high availability, precision, and actionable environmental insights.
projects.organization: Client Project - Smart City Solutions Inc.

projects.title: Color Palette Generator
projects.shortDescription: Modern color palette generator with category filters, search, and one-click copy.
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive color palette generator web application built with React, TypeScript, and Vite for optimal performance and type safety. Implemented advanced color palette generation with random color creation algorithms, category-based filtering (Pastel, Vintage, Neon, Warm, Cold), and intelligent search functionality supporting both color names and hex codes. Created interactive color palette cards with hover effects, one-click color copying to clipboard, and toast notifications for user feedback. Integrated dark/light theme toggle using next-themes, responsive design with Tailwind CSS, and smooth animations. Utilized shadcn/ui component library for a consistent design system including sidebar navigation, search inputs, and buttons. The application features a clean, modern interface with real-time palette generation and category-based organization.

projects.title: EduLe - E-Learning Platform Landing Page
projects.shortDescription: Modern e-learning landing with catalog, filters, testimonials, and mobile-first UI.
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive e-learning platform landing page called "EduLe" built with React, TypeScript, and Vite for optimal performance and type safety. Implemented a complete course catalog system with category filtering (Development, Data Science, Business, Finance), interactive course cards displaying ratings, student counts, and pricing. Created engaging sections including hero banner with call-to-action, "How It Works" process flow, student testimonials with avatars, and mobile app download buttons. Utilized shadcn/ui component library for consistent design system, Tailwind CSS for responsive styling, and Framer Motion for smooth animations and transitions. The application features a modern, mobile-first design with clean navigation and user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Lals - E-commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Modern e-commerce platform with advanced search, filtering, and payment integration.
projects.description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard. Built with Next.js and Strapi, featuring advanced search algorithms and responsive design.

projects.title: AI Portfolio Creator
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered portfolio generator with customizable templates and content suggestions.
projects.description: An intelligent portfolio creation tool that uses AI to suggest layouts, content, and design elements based on user input. Features include template library, drag-and-drop editor, and AI-powered content optimization.

projects.title: Modern Beverage App
projects.shortDescription: Mobile-first beverage ordering app with real-time tracking and payment integration.
projects.description: A modern beverage ordering application featuring menu browsing, custom drink builder, real-time order tracking, and seamless payment processing. Built with React Native and Firebase for cross-platform compatibility.

projects.title: Hotel Finder Pro
projects.shortDescription: Advanced hotel booking platform with AI-powered recommendations and virtual tours.
projects.description: Comprehensive hotel booking platform featuring AI-powered recommendations, virtual room tours, real-time availability, and integrated booking system. Built with Next.js and machine learning algorithms for personalized suggestions.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack food delivery application with real-time tracking and restaurant management.
projects.description: Complete food delivery solution including customer app, restaurant dashboard, delivery tracking, and payment processing. Features real-time GPS tracking, push notifications, and comprehensive analytics for restaurants.

projects.title: Blinkit UI - Premium E-Commerce App
projects.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade Flutter e-commerce app with clean architecture, advanced UI/UX, and real-time delivery tracking.
projects.description: Built a production-ready, enterprise-grade e-commerce mobile application inspired by Blinkit, India's leading instant delivery platform. Developed using Flutter with Clean Architecture and optimized state management, the app features OTP-based authentication, smart product search, dynamic category navigation, cart intelligence, personalized profiles, promotions, and real-time delivery tracking. Designed with Material Design 3.0, smooth animations, and cross-platform optimizations for iOS and Android, this project demonstrates scalable architecture, premium UI/UX, and business-driven functionality.
